last_episode_to_air.name: Tigress Woo
last_episode_to_air.overview: Kimiko and her older sister, Tigress have an estranged relationship. It becomes more complicated when Tigress shows up on her birthday and one of the Shen Gong Wu mysteriously disappears.

name: Xiaolin Chronicles
overview: The team of "Xiaolin Showdown" return in this seuqel series to hunt down Shen Gon Wu. By their side, a new ally joins them in the fight of good vs. evil.

episodes.name: New Monk on the Block
episodes.overview: In this epic three-parter opening, Master Fung promotes the Xiaolin Monks to Shoku Warriors. Their responsibility is to recruit and train a new Xiaolin Apprentice, but their decision must be unanimous.

episodes.name: A Girl Named Willow
episodes.overview: Willow and Ping Pong compete for the Xiaolin Apprentice top spot, as well as for Omi's attention. Kimiko grows suspicious of Willow's motives. Ping Pong drops out of the race, leaving the Xiaolin Temple.

episodes.name: The Fall of Xiaolin
episodes.overview: Willow uses her charms on all the boys in the temple. The Monks and Dojo set out on a journey to find their new home, while Master Fung goes on his walkabout.

episodes.name: Buddy Blue Ray and the Golden Bunnies
episodes.overview: Dojo dreams about mysterious dancing bunnies, which leads to a mystical talisman. The Monks must do what it takes to find and protect the sacred object or they will mutate into beastly creatures and destroy the village.

episodes.name: Tokyo Madness
episodes.overview: Kimiko must save the day by going inside Digital Tokyo-a virtual world built by her Father. Jack has taken control over the system. Can the Monks save the world before they are turned into avatars and trapped in cyberspace forever?

episodes.name: Magic Stallion and the Wild Wild West
episodes.overview: Clay saves his Grandpappy's cattle from being turned into a casualty of Jack's latest evil scientific experiment. The Xiaolin Monks are rewarded when the legendary Thunderhoof, a magical stallion, reveals himself.

episodes.name: Laws of Nature
episodes.overview: Chase Young discovers a weak link in the ecological order that will cause a domino effect of cataclysmic destruction. Both Xiaolin and Heylin must unite in a temporary alliance to reinstate the ecological order of the world.

episodes.name: Out of Ping Pong's Mind
episodes.overview: Chase Young grows wary of Ping Pong's power. To destroy him, Chase uses Ping Pong's own mind as a trap, literally. It is a mind-blowing experience, as fellow teammates battle Chase and Shadow inside Ping Pong's brain.

episodes.name: Xiaolin Redemption
episodes.overview: Our heroes must escort the dangerous, slippery half-man, half-reptilian Salvador Cumo to prison. Along the journey, Raimundo winds up falling prey to Salvador's charm, which puts the Monks' lives and mission at risk.

episodes.name: Princess Kaila of the Thousand Layer Mountain
episodes.overview: Chase launches an all out attack on the Xiaolin Monks, turning everyone except Omi into Cat Warriors. To save his friends, Omi must travel back in time to find Grand Master Dashi. The Monks find their new home, at last.

episodes.name: Planet of Dragons
episodes.overview: A mysterious mini-dragon arrives from the future, causing Dojo to accidentally disappear. The Xiaolin Monks travel forward in time, only to find Dojo has become the King of the Dragon Planet, where dragons rule and humans are kept as pets.

episodes.name: Tigress Woo
episodes.overview: Kimiko and her older sister, Tigress have an estranged relationship. It becomes more complicated when Tigress shows up on her birthday and one of the Shen Gong Wu mysteriously disappears.

episodes.name: Heylin Within
episodes.overview: Newbie Shoku Warrior Ping Pong is stressing over mastering all the tasks before him so he duplicates himself with the Ring of Catsumi Shen Gong Wu. This makes him vulnerable to Chase's evil plan to turn him into Reptilian Ping Pong.

episodes.name: Heal Me
episodes.overview: Through a bizarre mishap, Jack turns into Good Jack-a dynamite motivational speaker and cult figure. Meanwhile, Dojo, feeling slighted and unappreciated, joins Good Jack. He even helps Good Jack find the Shen Gong Wu.

episodes.name: Rocco
episodes.overview: Dojo goes ballistic when his childhood friend, Rocco, gets attention from Master Fung. Meanwhile, Chase and Shadow unleash the Chi Creature,turning the Monks into Zombies. Dojo and Rocco must work together to break free of Chase's clutches.

episodes.name: The Mask of the Green Monkey
episodes.overview: A dark talisman-the Mask of the Green Monkey-has surfaced. Unfortunately, it is located in a dangerous Land controlled by Warden, one of Chase's minions. Omi ignores advice and insists on going after this mysterious object.

episodes.name: Mi Temple, Mi Casa
episodes.overview: Furious that the Monks have escaped again, Chase unleashes his fury on Barkey, an ancient warrior turned talking tree in the new temple, and uses him as a weapon against the Monks. A Shoku Showdown ensues!

episodes.name: Super Cow Patty
episodes.overview: A mysterious superhero, Super Cow Patty, starts stealing the Monks' thunder in the battles for Shen Gong Wu. The brothers must learn to fight together in order to defeat La Mime, the silent but deadliest villain of all.

episodes.name: Chase Lays an Egg
episodes.overview: Omi feels alone and ends up befriending Jack Spicer. They take a giant egg right out of Chase's lair, suspecting it might be a Shen Gong Wu. Now Chase is bent on destroying everything to get it back.

episodes.name: Drawn to be Evil
episodes.overview: Tiny Sim, an evil artist and Jack's Number One fan, brings horrible weasel drawings to life with the aid of a Shen Gong Wu. Armed with mutated weasels, Tiny Sim rampages through town, giving the Monks and Jack a hard time.

episodes.name: Omi Saves the Holidays
episodes.overview: The Xiaolin Monks must save Christmas by traveling into the calendar and fighting Jack Spicer, who has taken over the holiday and turned it into "Jackmas".

episodes.name: Who Shrunk Master Fung
episodes.overview: Master Fung begins to shrink mysteriously in size, and the Monks must find a way to return him to his full stature before he shrinks to nothingness.

episodes.name: Back in the Flesh Again
episodes.overview: Wuya manipulates Jack and the Monks to steal the very Shen Gong Wu she needs to get her body back. But when Wuya's plan nearly backfires, Shadow secretly helps her.

episodes.name: The Call of the Dragon
episodes.overview: Kimiko sees a mystical vision, but the other Monks don't believe her. Following her dragon-sense, Kimiko discovers the missing Dojo, as well as Chase's evil plans.

episodes.name: The Mark of the Dragon Spirit
episodes.overview: The Monks join forces with Jack to track down Kimiko, who attempts to bond with a dragon, much to Omi's chagrin. Meanwhile, Chase turns into a Heylin Dragon, unleashing revenge on Xiaolin.

episodes.name: Fly the Dragon!
episodes.overview: Bonded with her dragon, Kimiko must team up with a jealous Omi to find and awaken the hidden Cosmic Dragon before Chase plunges the universe into ten thousand years of darkness!
